price: 59. Balobi: Nani asali banzambe na biso boye? Ya soló, ye azali moko ya babubi.
arabic: قَالُواْ مَن فَعَلَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَآ إِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qālū man faʿala hādhā biālihatinā innahu lamina al-ẓālimīna
